org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.css.codegen

Class CSSCompilationSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.css.codegen.CSSCompilationSession
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JSCSSCompilationSession

    public class CSSCompilationSession
extends Object
    A CSS compilation session stores data used by one compilation cycle.

    This class has two goals

    1. Cache CSS semantic resolution results for CSS code generation.
    2. Exclude CSS rules not used by any compilation units so that the target size SWF is smaller.

    In order to keep CSS model immutable during semantic analysis, the analysis result such as which rules to keep and which properties to clobber is stored in this auxiliary data structure.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Set<ICSSRule> activatedRules
      A set of rules that will be included in the code generation.
      List<ICSSDocument> cssDocuments
      A list of CSS models to be included in the code generation.
      ArrayList<CSSFontFace> fontFaces
      A set of font faces that will be included in the code generation.
      Set<String> inheritingStyles
      A set of inheriting style names.
      Map<CSSFunctionCallPropertyValue,EmbedCompilationUnit> resolvedEmbedProperties
      A map from Embed() property values to their resolved EmbedCompilationUnit's.
      Map<ICSSSelector,String> resolvedSelectors
      A map of type selectors to their resolved class qnames.

      • resolvedEmbedProperties

        public final Map<CSSFunctionCallPropertyValue,EmbedCompilationUnit> resolvedEmbedProperties

        A set of inheriting style names.

      • activatedRules

        public final Set<ICSSRule> activatedRules
        A set of rules that will be included in the code generation.

      • fontFaces

        public ArrayList<CSSFontFace> fontFaces
        A set of font faces that will be included in the code generation.

      • cssDocuments

        public final List<ICSSDocument> cssDocuments
        A list of CSS models to be included in the code generation. The CSS properties are prioritized by their order in the list. The first CSS in the model has the least priority.

    • Method Detail

      • keepRule

        protected boolean keepRule(ICSSRule newRule)
        Determine if a rule should be in the output
        Returns:
        true if rule should be in the output

      • synthesisNormalizedCSS

        protected ICSSDocument synthesisNormalizedCSS()
        Synthesize a normalized CSS model from the ICSSRule's activated from singleSelectorRules. The normalized CSS does not have "@namespace" rules; Its rules come from different CSS documents.
        Returns:
        A synthesized CSS model from normalized CSS model.

      • emitStyleDataClass

        public ICSSCodeGenResult emitStyleDataClass(IFlexProject project,
                                   IABCVisitor abcVisitor)
                                     throws Exception
        Generate code for CSS data.
        Parameters:
        project - ICompilerProject for which code is being generated.
        abcVisitor - IABCVisitor to which needed abc constructs are added.
        Throws:
        Exception - error

      • disable

        public void disable()
        Disables CSS code generation and dependency analysis for this CSSCompilationSession. This method is called from SWFTarget when compiling a SWF that will not have a system manager.

      • isDisabled

        public boolean isDisabled()
        Returns:
        true if CSS code generation and dependency analysis is disabled for this CSSCompilationSession, false otherwise.

      • isKeepAllTypeSelectors

        public boolean isKeepAllTypeSelectors()
        Returns:
        True if all type selectors are kept for linking.

      • setKeepAllTypeSelectors

        public void setKeepAllTypeSelectors(boolean keepAllTypeSelectors)
        Set whether to keep all type selectors for linking.
        Parameters:
        keepAllTypeSelectors - value
